lyric: 作词 : 崔瀚普TSAR (HOYO-MiX)
作曲 : 王可鑫 Eli.W (HOYO-MiX)
编曲 : 崔瀚普TSAR (HOYO-MiX)
制作人 : 崔瀚普TSAR (HOYO-MiX)
I want you to show me
translation: 请对我展示

lyric: Your fantasy. (Your fantasy)
translation: 你的幻境

lyric: No past and No future.
translation: 我所需要的生活

lyric: That's what I need. (That's what I need)
translation: 没有曾经和以后

lyric: The groove takes it over.
translation: 这律动掌控着一切

lyric: We'll wait and see.
translation: 让我们拭目以待

lyric: Even I might blank out
translation: 即便我可能会遗忘

lyric: You and me.
translation: 你和我是谁

lyric: I thought that dream could light our way.
translation: 本以为梦境可以让我们看见明天

lyric: Oh, be my savior and take me away. (away, away)
translation: 现在还是快拯救我 带我走吧

lyric: (Take me away)
Tick, and, tock, once more. You're hosting
translation: 时钟嘀嗒反反复复

lyric: A magic show I cannot escape.
translation: 你在主持一场无法逃脱的魔术

lyric: There's nothing else left for me to do.
translation: 自己也不再有任何事情可做

lyric: Going to the other side. (Other side)
translation: 只需净身前往那一边的世界

lyric: I don't wanna be alone tonight.
translation: 今夜我不想再独自徘徊

lyric: Oh, Lead me with your altered sign.
translation: 无论你的路标指引我去何处

lyric: There's no one else left for me to lose.
translation: 反正自己也不再有任何可失去的人

lyric: Heading to the other side. （Other side）
translation: 只需净身前往那一边的世界

lyric: Just be my savior and take me away. (away, away)
translation: 现在还是快拯救我 带我走吧

lyric: (Singing with me everyone.)
I don't wanna be alone tonight.
translation: 今夜我不想再独自徘徊

lyric: Oh, bring me to the other side.
translation: 快带领我前往另一边的世界

lyric: There's no one else left for me to lose.
translation: 自己也不再有任何可失去的人

lyric: Going to the other side. （Other side）
translation: 只需净身前往那一边的世界

lyric: I don't wanna be alone tonight.
translation: 今夜我不想再独自徘徊

lyric: I'll bring you to my best disguise
translation: 人们还是在我的伪装下更熟知我

lyric: Cuz I don't need（don't need to know the truth）
translation: 没人需要知道真相

lyric: Let me rave forever in your lies.
translation: 让我在你的谎言里永远狂欢.

lyric: 人声 Vocal Artist：Jake Miller
小号/富鲁格号 Trumpet/Flugelhorn：夏非
长号 Trombone：曹侃
录音棚 Recording Studio：升赫录音棚Soundhub Studio
录音师 Recording Engineer：Kevin刘瀚文@Soundhub Studios
混音师 Mixing Engineer：崔瀚普TSAR (HOYO-MiX)
母带制作 Mastering Engineer：崔瀚普TSAR (HOYO-MiX)
出品 Produced by：HOYO-MiX
